report.query: select PARTY.lsp_le_id,PARTY.LSP_SHORT_NAME, (select entry_name from COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY where CATEGORY_CODE ='SYSTEM' and ACTIVE_STATUS = '1' and entry_code = FAC.FACILITY_SYSTEM) system ,fac.lmt_id, (select entry_name from COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY where CATEGORY_CODE ='FACILITY_CATEGORY' and ACTIVE_STATUS = '1' and entry_code = FAC.FACILITY_CAT) FACILITY_CAT ,FAC.FACILITY_NAME, FAC.FACILITY_TYPE, (select entry_name from COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY where CATEGORY_CODE ='BANKING_ARRANGEMENT' and ACTIVE_STATUS = '1' and entry_code = FAC.BANKING_ARRANGEMENT) FAC_BANKING_ARRANGEMENT ,(select entry_name from COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY where CATEGORY_CODE ='CLAUSE_AS_PER_POLICY' and ACTIVE_STATUS = '1' and entry_code = FAC.CLAUSE_AS_PER_POLICY) FAC_CLAUSE_AS_PER_POLICY, LINE.FACILITY_SYSTEM_ID,LINE.LINE_NO,LINE.SERIAL_NO, (select entry_name from COMMON_CODE_CATEGORY_ENTRY where CATEGORY_CODE ='BANKING_ARRANGEMENT' and ACTIVE_STATUS = '1' and entry_code = LINE.BANKING_ARRANGEMENT) LINE_BANKING_ARRANGEMENT from SCI_LSP_APPR_LMTS fac inner join SCI_LSP_LMT_PROFILE cam on CAM.CMS_LSP_LMT_PROFILE_ID = fac.cms_limit_profile_id inner join SCI_LE_SUB_PROFILE party on PARTY.CMS_LE_SUB_PROFILE_ID = CAM.CMS_CUSTOMER_ID left join sci_lsp_lmts_xref_map linkage on FAC.CMS_LSP_APPR_LMTS_ID = LINKAGE.CMS_LSP_APPR_LMTS_ID left join sci_lsp_sys_xref line on line.CMS_LSP_SYS_XREF_ID = LINKAGE.CMS_LSP_SYS_XREF_ID
